## WidgetDiv.show() function

Initialize and display the widget div. Close the old one if needed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function show(newOwner: AnyDuringMigration, rtl: boolean, newDispose: Function): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newOwner | AnyDuringMigration | The object that will be using this container. |
|  rtl | boolean | Right-to-left (true) or left-to-right (false). |
|  newDispose | Function | Optional cleanup function to be run when the widget is closed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
